import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './AttendancePageStyles.css'; const AttendancePage = () => { const [employeeName, setEmployeeName] = useState("Krishna Kumar Dhanabalan"); const [weekNumber, setWeekNumber] = useState("09 (24 Feb 2025 - 02 Mar 2025)"); const [attendanceDetails, setAttendanceDetails] = useState([]); const [formDetails, setFormDetails] = useState({ workWeekDate: '', projectID: '', SOWPhase: '', task: '', taskDescription: '', nonTesterHours: '', testerID: '', testerPlatform: '', testerLocation: '', testerHours: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormDetails({ ...formDetails, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleAdd = () => { setAttendanceDetails([...attendanceDetails, formDetails]); setFormDetails({ workWeekDate: '', projectID: '', SOWPhase: '', task: '', taskDescription: '', nonTesterHours: '', testerID: '', testerPlatform: '', testerLocation: '', testerHours: '', }); }; return (
YourCompany
Hi {employeeName}

Important Instructions

  • Enter actual hours you have worked on the project (even if it is more than the standard working hours)
  • Make sure you are entering into the right project ID
  • If you are working on multiple projects, submit the hours accordingly to the respective project IDs
  • The best practice is to save the timesheet on a daily basis and submit it before the "End of the Day" every Friday
{attendanceDetails.map((detail, index) => ( ))}
Work Week Date Project ID & Name SOW Phase Task Task Description Non-Tester Hours Tester ID Tester Platform Tester Location Tester Hours
{detail.workWeekDate} {detail.projectID} {detail.SOWPhase} {detail.task} {detail.taskDescription} {detail.nonTesterHours} {detail.testerID} {detail.testerPlatform} {detail.testerLocation} {detail.testerHours}
); }; export default AttendancePage;
